Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO WOMEN'S ISSUES

Title: Establishes the cesarean births review board
Summary: Establishes the cesarean births review board; provides such board shall be comprised of multidisciplinary experts to review the rate of cesarean births at hospitals in the state; provides reporting requirements.
LawCode: Add ยง2500-n, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing the cesarean births review board
